text: Martin Bell, OBE (born 31 August 1938) is a British UNICEF (UNICEF UK) Ambassador, a former broadcast war reporter and former independent politician. He was an Member of Parliament (MP) for Tatton from 1997 to 2001. Sometimes, he is called "the man in the white suit". == References == Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of King's College, Cambridge Category:British war correspondents Category:British television presenters Category:Independent politicians in the United Kingdom Category:Politicians from Suffolk
title: Martin Bell
